query.value: SELECT Id, PardotTenantName FROM PardotTenant WHERE IsDeleted = false

request.description:
A regular identity user will not suffice for this.

You need to make sure that the Connected App has the API scope, AND the user has the ability to read PardotTenant objects. Ideal for an administrator who might be setting up your app.
